pkgmetadata.longdescription: Access and Import WMS and WFS Data from Argentine Organizations // Provides functions to retrieve information from Web Feature Service (WFS) and Web Map Service (WMS) layers from various Argentine organizations and import them into R for further analysis. WFS and WMS are standardized protocols for serving georeferenced map data over the internet. For more information on these services, see https://www.ogc.org/publications/standard/wfs/ and https://www.ogc.org/publications/standard/wms/.
